column4: I've download a file and I dunno where Ubuntu placed it. How do I find path to that file? Thank You.
downloaded what file and how did you download it?
sjovan : sudo apt-get install libusb-0.1-4 libusb-dev linux-headers-$(uname -r)
why do you want to locate it? any ways... ---> sudo slocate -u ---> locate filname will tell you
